Header.subTitle: We connect 120,000 Indonesian Workers
Header.title: Make your dream of working in Japan come true.
Header.description: Inka Global Management (IGM) focuses on foreign human resource management services, specifically for Indonesian workers who aspire to work in Japan. We offer comprehensive solutions for visa applications, interpretation, and translation to ensure that every worker receives the best opportunities and protection while working in Japan. Additionally, IGM's travel services cater to business visits and cultural explorations, providing a comfortable and safe experience in Japan.

Filosofi.title: Philosophy
Filosofi.description: At IGM, we believe that every individual has the potential to achieve success in a competitive international environment. Based on trust, expertise, and commitment, we are determined to be the bridge between Indonesian workers and companies in Japan. Our philosophy is that success is realized through mutually beneficial collaboration, ongoing support, and effective adaptation to both cultural and professional demands. We believe that every process, from visa processing to job transitions and skill development, should be carried out with integrity, transparency, and full attention to individual needs. By providing comprehensive and targeted services, we help foreign workers thrive in Japan while contributing to the growth and progress of the companies they work with.

PengurusanVisa.title: Visa Processing
PengurusanVisa.description: Visa processing at IGM is very easy and structured. We handle all types of work visas, including engineer visas and specified skilled worker visas. Every applicant will receive full assistance from document collection to visa submission. We also provide consultations for prospective workers who want to understand more about visa requirements and processes.

Terhubung.title: Connect Company
Terhubung.description: Through this service, IGM helps connect Indonesian workers with Japanese companies that require specific qualifications and skills. We collaborate with various industries in Japan, such as engineering, manufacturing, construction, and hospitality, to provide suitable job opportunities for Indonesian workers. IGM ensures the matching process runs smoothly by understanding the needs of both parties.

InterpretasiPenerjemah.title: Interpretation & Translation
InterpretasiPenerjemah.description: IGM provides professional interpretation and translation services for various needs, both business and personal. We ensure that communication between workers and Japanese companies is effective, especially in contract negotiations, meetings, and the preparation of official documents. This service is essential for workers who are not yet fluent in Japanese or for companies seeking better communication with foreign workers.

StudiBunding.title: Study Tour
StudiBunding.description: IGM offers study tour programs for those who want to learn about best practices in Japan. This program is designed for students, professionals, or companies who want to understand the work culture and industrial systems in Japan. We arrange visits to leading companies and institutions in various industry sectors, providing direct insights into innovation and management in Japan.

SekolahBahasaJepang.title: Japanese Language School
SekolahBahasaJepang.description: For those who want to improve their Japanese language skills, IGM provides a referral service to accredited Japanese language schools. We help prospective students find schools that meet their needs and language proficiency levels, from beginner to advanced.

Travel.title: Travel
Travel.description:
A travel service designed to meet your travel needs in Japan. Whether for personal visits, business trips, or cultural exploration, we offer support in planning travel routes, accommodation, and local transportation, with special attention to comfort and safety.

Profile.title: Profile
Profile.description: Inka Global Management (IGM) is a company that supports Indonesian workers in developing their careers in Japan. We provide comprehensive services, from visa processing, job transitions, interpretation and translation, to introductions to Japanese language schools and travel services for business or cultural exploration. With extensive experience and networks, IGM ensures a smooth adaptation process in Japan, helping our clients achieve success in an international environment.

visi.title: Vision
visi.description: To become a leading company providing comprehensive and reliable services for Indonesian workers aiming to build a career in Japan, focusing on visa processing, job transitions, interpretation, and education in language and culture, fostering harmonious and sustainable professional relationships between workers and Japanese companies.

misi.title: Mission
misi.1: Facilitating visa processing for Indonesian workers, including visa extensions and status changes (from trainee to tokutei-ginou or engineer), with fast and accurate service standards in accordance with applicable regulations.
misi.2: Supporting the career development of Indonesian workers in Japan through effective job transition services, ensuring that each worker finds opportunities suited to their skills and aspirations.
misi.3: Acting as a bridge between workers and Japanese companies through the Connect Company service, ensuring professional compatibility and creating sustainable employment opportunities.
misi.4: Providing accurate and professional interpretation and translation services to facilitate effective communication between foreign workers and Japanese companies.
misi.5: Offering opportunities for language and cultural skills development through introductions to language schools (shoukai nihongo gakko) and study tour programs, enhancing adaptation and success in the Japanese work environment.
misi.6: Creating an inclusive and supportive work environment for foreign workers in Japan, providing comprehensive consulting, guidance, and services from the initial process to long-term career sustainability.

Question.1: What services does Inka Global Management (IGM) offer?
Question.2: How does IGM assist with visa processing for Indonesian workers?
Question.3: Does IGM provide services for job transitions in Japan?

Answer.1: IGM offers a variety of services for Indonesian workers in Japan, including visa processing (extensions and status changes), job transitions, introductions to Japanese companies (Connect Company), interpretation and translation services, study tour programs, and referrals to Japanese language schools (shoukai nihongo gakko).
Answer.2: IGM assists with engineer and specified skilled worker (tokutei-ginou) visas, as well as visa extensions. For visa status changes, IGM helps workers transition from trainee to tokutei-ginou or engineer visas by ensuring they meet requirements such as JFT A2 and SSW for tokutei-ginou, and appropriate diplomas for engineer visas.
Answer.3: Yes, IGM offers job transition services for foreign workers in Japan who are seeking new job opportunities. This service includes career consultations, visa document processing if needed, and job searches that align with the worker's qualifications.

data.CEO_Message:
As CEO, I am honored to lead a company that is fully dedicated to supporting Indonesian workers in realizing their dreams of pursuing a career in Japan. At IGM, we believe that everyone deserves the opportunity to grow and succeed, not just for themselves but also for their families and the broader community. 

Our vision is simple yet powerful: to bridge the international workforce by providing comprehensive services, from visa processing to career transitions, while supporting adaptation to Japanese language and culture. We are committed to offering the right solutions and ongoing support, as we understand that this process is not always easy. However, through dedication and hard work, we believe that together, we can achieve success. 

Through our work philosophy, based on trust, expertise, and mutually beneficial collaboration, IGM is determined to be your trusted partner in helping you achieve both professional and personal goals in Japan. We continuously strive to enhance our services, ensuring they remain relevant and effective, making every step you take with us a step towards a better future. 

Thank you for entrusting your journey to us. We are ready to support you every step of the way in achieving a better career and life in Japan.

Anidika Pramana 
CEO, Inka Global Management (IGM)
